description:
A powerful and versatile Slicer for Resin and Filament 3D Printers

With Lychee Slicer, you get the best companion to prepare 3D models for your Resin and Filament 3D Printers. Get access to many features to create a tailored and smooth workflow that fits your needs! Lychee Slicer is easy to use and provides powerful tools in an elegant and intuitive interface. Always be at the edge of 3D Printing with Lychee Slicer!
Auto Support Improvements & New Printer Support. This stable release focuses on refining the new Auto Support system introduced in 7.5, making it more precise, smarter and more reliable, while also adding support for a highly requested printer. [HOTFIX 7.5.5] We fixed an issue where overhang supports were no longer working.
New üéâ

New Resin Printers Compatibility
- Piocreate Halot X1
Auto Support Improvements ‚öôÔ∏è

Improved Overhang Support System
- Added dynamic spacing based on angle
- Users can define spacing at 0¬∞ and at a maximum angle
- Added 3 new overhang support presets, automatically calculated based on supported volume

Smarter Support Placement Between Close Islands
- When two islands are closer than the support tip size, only one support is now placed
- This single support efficiently supports both islands
- Result: fewer supports, cleaner prints

Maximum Angle for Reinforcement & Stabilization
- Added a maximum angle parameter for reinforcement and stabilization supports
- Works similarly to overhang angle settings
- Gives better control over where supports are generated

Improved Reinforcement Point Placement
- Reinforcement points are now prioritized on overhang surfaces
- Leads to stronger structural support where it matters most

Mini Support Filtering
- Added a filtering system to prevent extremely small mini supports
- Reduces unnecessary supports and improves print cleanliness
